bssearchadmin-desc: Description text for title attribute in menu link
bs-extendedsearch-search-input-placehold: Placeholder text within the search input field
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-wikipage: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'wikipage'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-specialpa: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'specialpage'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-repofile: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'repofile'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-user: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'user'
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-backend:
Label for heading of a section that lists information about a backend on Special:SearchAdmin.
* $1 - the key of the backend
bs-extendedsearch-admin-label-error: Label for an error message on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-label-all-docume: Label for information about the nubmer of documents in the index on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-sources: Label for heading of a section that lists information about the sources within a specific backend on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-sources-: Label for field that reports the number of documents within a specific source on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-pendingu: Label for field that reports the number of pending update jobs for a specific source on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-hitcount:
Text showing how many hits search request has returned.
 $1 - number of hits, $2 - search term
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-addfilte: Title for the add filter dialog
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-f: Label for the extension field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
Label for the namespace_text field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
Label for the tags field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
Label for the categories field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t: Label for the type pseudo-field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-f: Label for the extension field in the filter values are selected
Label for the namespace_text field in the filter values are selected
Label for the tags field in the filter values are selected
Label for the categories field in the filter values are selected
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t: Label for the type pseudo-field in the filter values are selected
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-n: Text that appears in the filter popup when no options are available
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-n: Label for the namespace field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-c: Label for the category field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-a: Label for the author field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-s: Label for the sections field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-c: Label for the created time field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-m: Label for the modified time field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-n: Text that is diplayed when search has yielded no results
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-pagesize: Title label for PageSize dialog, showing options for results per page
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-sort-ord: Label for radio button for ascending sort order
Label for radio button for descending sort order
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-dialog-b: Label for dialog button with action cancel
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-options-: Label for confirmation button in search options dialog with apply changes action
bs-extendedseaerch-search-center-options: Label for the page size option in search options dialog. This options sets how many results will be displayed per page
Label for the sort by option in search options dialog. This options sets the field results are sorted by
Label for the sort order option in search options dialog. This options sets the order of sorting - asc or desc
